source: I strongly recommend dismantling most of them to be able to build industrial buildings. I don’t think there is much danger on this island, but if you want to be cautious, you can keep some sentries or blockhouses near the coastline.
target: I strongly recommend dismantling most of them to be able to build industrial buildings. I don’t think there is much danger on this island, but if you want to be cautious, you can keep some sentries or blockhouses near the coastline.

source: Therefore I took the freedom to restrict our current building options to the lumberjack’s house until we have gained enough building materials by dismantling the ineffective buildings.
target: Therefore I took the freedom to restrict our current building options to the woodcutter’s house until we have gained enough building materials by dismantling the ineffective buildings.

source: There are two different ways of destroying a building: burning down and dismantling. Try them both out on your quarries.
target: There are two different ways of destroying a building: burning down and dismantling. Try them both out on your quarries.

source: Build at least three lumberjack’s houses and two quarries to renew your building material supply chain.
target: Build at least three woodcutter’s houses and two quarries to renew your building material supply chain.

source: Now we know what’s going on. Let’s wait for the quarries to finish.
target: Now we know what’s going on. Let’s wait for the quarries to finish.

source: Well done! Let’s see how messages work in a real game, shall we? For this, I’ll take all rocks away from the poor stonemasons in the quarries. They will then send a message each that they can’t find any in their work areas the next time they try to do some work.
target: Well done! Let’s see how messages work in a real game, shall we? For this, I’ll take all rocks away from the poor stonemasons in the quarries. They will then send a message each that they can’t find any in their work areas the next time they try to do some work.

source: You received some messages. See how the button at the bottom of the screen has changed appearance? You can destroy the quarries now as they are no longer of any use and just blocking space. To do so, there are two possibilities:
target: You received some messages. See how the button at the bottom of the screen has changed appearance? You can destroy the quarries now as they are no longer of any use and just blocking space. To do so, there are two possibilities:

source: Since our quarries are useless now, you can destroy them and reuse the space later on.
target: Since our quarries are useless now, you can destroy them and reuse the space later on.

source: The Atlanteans produce granite blocks in quarries and crystal mines.
target: The Atlanteans produce granite blocks in quarries and crystal mines.

source: The Barbarians produce granite blocks in quarries and granite mines.
target: The Barbarians produce granite blocks in quarries and granite mines.

source: The Empire produces granite blocks in quarries and marble mines.
target: The Empire produces granite blocks in quarries and marble mines.
